attributes.action: Reduce the TV Licence fee as the BBC have lost the rights to show F.A Cup football and all England home games as of 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC have just been outbid by ITV and Setanta sports to show F.A Cup football and England home games as of 2008. This immediatly saves the BBC about £400 million for the rights and countless hundreds of thousands in outside broadcast costs.Where is this money going to go?? If you want to watch these games you will now have ANOTHER subscription to pay!! I petition that we get a reduction in our lincence fee as the BBC no longer the vast amounts of money that they claim.
